speaker:
FIRST
               
              WITCH
text:
When
               
              shall
               
              we
               
              three
               
              meet
               
              again
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WITCH
text:
In
               
              thunder
              ,
               
              lightning
              ,
               
              or
               
              in
               
              rain
              ?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WITCH
text:
When
               
              the
               
              battle’s
               
              lost
               
              and
               
              won
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WITCH
text:
That
               
              will
               
              be
               
              ere
               
              the
               
              set
               
              of
               
              sun
              .

speaker: ALL
text:
Fair
               
              is
               
              foul
              ,
               
              and
               
              foul
               
              is
               
              fair
              ;

speaker: ALL
text:
Hover
               
              through
               
              the
               
              fog
               
              and
               
              filthy
               
              air
              .
